name: [KenneyJam2017] Fidget Blocks (Web based)
description:
Fidget Blocks is a submission for the 2017 Kenney Game Jam. All assets came from Kenney.nl.

  • The object of the game is to rotate the board using the mouse and click on grouped blocks to score points. You have 10 strikes. Once you're out of strikes, the game ends.
